00030 #ifndef AC_KSEQ_H
00031 #define AC_KSEQ_H
00032 
00033 #include <ctype.h>
00034 #include <string.h>
00035 #include <stdlib.h>
00036 
00037 #define KS_SEP_SPACE 0 // isspace(): \t, \n, \v, \f, \r
00038 #define KS_SEP_TAB   1 // isspace() && !' '
00039 #define KS_SEP_MAX   1
00040 
00041 #define __KS_TYPE(type_t)                                               \
00042         typedef struct __kstream_t {                            \
00043                 char *buf;                                                              \
00044                 int begin, end, is_eof;                                 \
00045                 type_t f;                                                               \
00046         } kstream_t;
00047 
00048 #define ks_eof(ks) ((ks)->is_eof && (ks)->begin >= (ks)->end)
00049 #define ks_rewind(ks) ((ks)->is_eof = (ks)->begin = (ks)->end = 0)
00050 
00051 #define __KS_BASIC(type_t, __bufsize)                                                           \
00052         static inline kstream_t *ks_init(type_t f)                                              \
00053         {                                                                                                                               \
00054                 kstream_t *ks = (kstream_t*)calloc(1, sizeof(kstream_t));       \
00055                 ks->f = f;                                                                                                      \
00056                 ks->buf = (char*)malloc(__bufsize);                                                     \
00057                 return ks;                                                                                                      \
00058         }                                                                                                                               \
00059         static inline void ks_destroy(kstream_t *ks)                                    \
00060         {                                                                                                                               \
00061                 if (ks) {                                                                                                       \
00062                         free(ks->buf);                                                                                  \
00063                         free(ks);                                                                                               \
00064                 }                                                                                                                       \
00065         }
00066 
00067 #define __KS_GETC(__read, __bufsize)                                            \
00068         static inline int ks_getc(kstream_t *ks)                                \
00069         {                                                                                                               \
00070                 if (ks->is_eof && ks->begin >= ks->end) return -1;      \
00071                 if (ks->begin >= ks->end) {                                                     \
00072                         ks->begin = 0;                                                                  \
00073                         ks->end = __read(ks->f, ks->buf, __bufsize);    \
00074                         if (ks->end < __bufsize) ks->is_eof = 1;                \
00075                         if (ks->end == 0) return -1;                                    \
00076                 }                                                                                                       \
00077                 return (int)ks->buf[ks->begin++];                                       \
00078         }
00079 
00080 #ifndef KSTRING_T
00081 #define KSTRING_T kstring_t
00082 typedef struct __kstring_t {
00083         size_t l, m;
00084         char *s;
00085 } kstring_t;
00086 #endif
00087 
00088 #ifndef kroundup32
00089 #define kroundup32(x) (--(x), (x)|=(x)>>1, (x)|=(x)>>2, (x)|=(x)>>4, (x)|=(x)>>8, (x)|=(x)>>16, ++(x))
00090 #endif
00091 
00092 #define __KS_GETUNTIL(__read, __bufsize)                                                                \
00093         static int ks_getuntil(kstream_t *ks, int delimiter, kstring_t *str, int *dret) \
00094         {                                                                                                                                       \
00095                 if (dret) *dret = 0;                                                                                    \
00096                 str->l = 0;                                                                                                             \
00097                 if (ks->begin >= ks->end && ks->is_eof) return -1;                              \
00098                 for (;;) {                                                                                                              \
00099                         int i;                                                                                                          \
00100                         if (ks->begin >= ks->end) {                                                                     \
00101                                 if (!ks->is_eof) {                                                                              \
00102                                         ks->begin = 0;                                                                          \
00103                                         ks->end = __read(ks->f, ks->buf, __bufsize);            \
00104                                         if (ks->end < __bufsize) ks->is_eof = 1;                        \
00105                                         if (ks->end == 0) break;                                                        \
00106                                 } else break;                                                                                   \
00107                         }                                                                                                                       \
00108                         if (delimiter > KS_SEP_MAX) {                                                           \
00109                                 for (i = ks->begin; i < ks->end; ++i)                                   \
00110                                         if (ks->buf[i] == delimiter) break;                                     \
00111                         } else if (delimiter == KS_SEP_SPACE) {                                         \
00112                                 for (i = ks->begin; i < ks->end; ++i)                                   \
00113                                         if (isspace(ks->buf[i])) break;                                         \
00114                         } else if (delimiter == KS_SEP_TAB) {                                           \
00115                                 for (i = ks->begin; i < ks->end; ++i)                                   \
00116                                         if (isspace(ks->buf[i]) && ks->buf[i] != ' ') break; \
00117                         } else i = 0; /* never come to here! */                                         \
00118                         if (str->m - str->l < i - ks->begin + 1) {                                      \
00119                                 str->m = str->l + (i - ks->begin) + 1;                                  \
00120                                 kroundup32(str->m);                                                                             \
00121                                 str->s = (char*)realloc(str->s, str->m);                                \
00122                         }                                                                                                                       \
00123                         memcpy(str->s + str->l, ks->buf + ks->begin, i - ks->begin); \
00124                         str->l = str->l + (i - ks->begin);                                                      \
00125                         ks->begin = i + 1;                                                                                      \
00126                         if (i < ks->end) {                                                                                      \
00127                                 if (dret) *dret = ks->buf[i];                                                   \
00128                                 break;                                                                                                  \
00129                         }                                                                                                                       \
00130                 }                                                                                                                               \
00131                 if (str->l == 0) {                                                                                              \
00132                         str->m = 1;                                                                                                     \
00133                         str->s = (char*)calloc(1, 1);                                                           \
00134                 }                                                                                                                               \
00135                 str->s[str->l] = '\0';                                                                                  \
00136                 return str->l;                                                                                                  \
00137         }
00138 
00139 #define KSTREAM_INIT(type_t, __read, __bufsize) \
00140         __KS_TYPE(type_t)                                                       \
00141         __KS_BASIC(type_t, __bufsize)                           \
00142         __KS_GETC(__read, __bufsize)                            \
00143         __KS_GETUNTIL(__read, __bufsize)
00144 
00145 #define __KSEQ_BASIC(type_t)                                                                                    \
00146         static inline kseq_t *kseq_init(type_t fd)                                                      \
00147         {                                                                                                                                       \
00148                 kseq_t *s = (kseq_t*)calloc(1, sizeof(kseq_t));                                 \
00149                 s->f = ks_init(fd);                                                                                             \
00150                 return s;                                                                                                               \
00151         }                                                                                                                                       \
00152         static inline void kseq_rewind(kseq_t *ks)                                                      \
00153         {                                                                                                                                       \
00154                 ks->last_char = 0;                                                                                              \
00155                 ks->f->is_eof = ks->f->begin = ks->f->end = 0;                                  \
00156         }                                                                                                                                       \
00157         static inline void kseq_destroy(kseq_t *ks)                                                     \
00158         {                                                                                                                                       \
00159                 if (!ks) return;                                                                                                \
00160                 free(ks->name.s); free(ks->comment.s); free(ks->seq.s); free(ks->qual.s); \
00161                 ks_destroy(ks->f);                                                                                              \
00162                 free(ks);                                                                                                               \
00163         }
00164 
00165 /* Return value:
00166    >=0  length of the sequence (normal)
00167    -1   end-of-file
00168    -2   truncated quality string
00169  */
00170 #define __KSEQ_READ                                                                                                             \
00171         static int kseq_read(kseq_t *seq)                                                                       \
00172         {                                                                                                                                       \
00173                 int c;                                                                                                                  \
00174                 kstream_t *ks = seq->f;                                                                                 \
00175                 if (seq->last_char == 0) { /* then jump to the next header line */ \
00176                         while ((c = ks_getc(ks)) != -1 && c != '>' && c != '@');        \
00177                         if (c == -1) return -1; /* end of file */                                       \
00178                         seq->last_char = c;                                                                                     \
00179                 } /* the first header char has been read */                                             \
00180                 seq->comment.l = seq->seq.l = seq->qual.l = 0;                                  \
00181                 if (ks_getuntil(ks, 0, &seq->name, &c) < 0) return -1;                  \
00182                 if (c != '\n') ks_getuntil(ks, '\n', &seq->comment, 0);                 \
00183                 while ((c = ks_getc(ks)) != -1 && c != '>' && c != '+' && c != '@') { \
00184                         if (isgraph(c)) { /* printable non-space character */           \
00185                                 if (seq->seq.l + 1 >= seq->seq.m) { /* double the memory */ \
00186                                         seq->seq.m = seq->seq.l + 2;                                            \
00187                                         kroundup32(seq->seq.m); /* rounded to next closest 2^k */ \
00188                                         seq->seq.s = (char*)realloc(seq->seq.s, seq->seq.m); \
00189                                 }                                                                                                               \
00190                                 seq->seq.s[seq->seq.l++] = (char)c;                                             \
00191                         }                                                                                                                       \
00192                 }                                                                                                                               \
00193                 if (c == '>' || c == '@') seq->last_char = c; /* the first header char has been read */ \
00194                 seq->seq.s[seq->seq.l] = 0;     /* null terminated string */            \
00195                 if (c != '+') return seq->seq.l; /* FASTA */                                    \
00196                 if (seq->qual.m < seq->seq.m) { /* allocate enough memory */    \
00197                         seq->qual.m = seq->seq.m;                                                                       \
00198                         seq->qual.s = (char*)realloc(seq->qual.s, seq->qual.m);         \
00199                 }                                                                                                                               \
00200                 while ((c = ks_getc(ks)) != -1 && c != '\n'); /* skip the rest of '+' line */ \
00201                 if (c == -1) return -2; /* we should not stop here */                   \
00202                 while ((c = ks_getc(ks)) != -1 && seq->qual.l < seq->seq.l)             \
00203                         if (c >= 33 && c <= 127) seq->qual.s[seq->qual.l++] = (unsigned char)c; \
00204                 seq->qual.s[seq->qual.l] = 0; /* null terminated string */              \
00205                 seq->last_char = 0;     /* we have not come to the next header line */ \
00206                 if (seq->seq.l != seq->qual.l) return -2; /* qual string is shorter than seq string */ \
00207                 return seq->seq.l;                                                                                              \
00208         }
00209 
00210 #define __KSEQ_TYPE(type_t)                                             \
00211         typedef struct {                                                        \
00212                 kstring_t name, comment, seq, qual;             \
00213                 int last_char;                                                  \
00214                 kstream_t *f;                                                   \
00215         } kseq_t;
00216 
00217 #define KSEQ_INIT(type_t, __read)                               \
00218         KSTREAM_INIT(type_t, __read, 4096)                      \
00219         __KSEQ_TYPE(type_t)                                                     \
00220         __KSEQ_BASIC(type_t)                                            \
00221         __KSEQ_READ
00222 
00223 #endif
